conversations.content: X Month, X Day. The Cameras Love Me! I'm now the restaurateur of a pancake shop! I've just gotta get that big ol' glutton to say that ＂Nimis loves tasties＂ and the customers will come pouring in. Cha-ching!

X Month, Y Day. Hello, Holiday Hottie! Hey, guys! Hope you're all working hard! Me, I'm on vacation with the money I saved from NOT working, and I'll be flying home first- class with my new tycoon friend, Gilgamesh.

X Month, Z Day. Looks are Everything! Elysium was making tons of money on his (totally fake!) tabloids until the angels took him in. Confiscated all his earnings and everything. Guess he took it a bit too far...
Y Month, X Day. I've Got Zits! Some nasty rumors have started spreading, and now everything is falling apart. I honestly only ever wanted everyone to acknowledge me!
Y Month, Z Day. Gosh, I'm so Handsome! Midgardsormr and all my friends were worried about me, so they took me to Kagutsuchi's hot springs. Friends really are the best!
All I had to do was be visibly upset, and they were all so nice to me!  When life gives you lemons and all that, eh? I really am one savvy stud...
